original_text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded him: and he took Joshua, and set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation:
korean_text: 모세가 여호와께서 자기에게 명령하신 대로 하여 여호수아를 데려다가 제사장 엘르아살과 온 회중 앞에 세우고

sentences.original_text: And Moses did as the Lord commanded him
and set him before Eleazar the priest
